name: Giorgos Stamou
content: Homepage of Giorgos Stamou School of Electrical and Computer EngineeringNational Technical University of Athens Giorgos Stamou homepage Contact details Scientific interests Research projects Publications Teaching Past activities Tools Associate Professor Computer Science Division School of Electrical and Computer Engineering National Technical University of Athens Intelligent Systems, Content and Interaction Laboratory [Artificial Intelligence Group] Contact details Address: [Office 1.1.7, Electrical and Computer Engineering Building, National Technical University of Athens, Zographou 15780, Athens, Greece] Telephone: +30 21 0772 3040 Fax: +30 21 0772 2492 e-mail: gstam at cs.ntua.gr Scientific Interests knowledge representation and reasoning description logics imprecise knowledge and automated reasoning ontology evolution and machine learning knowledge and data integration semantic query answering query rewriting over knowledge graphs Semantic Web applications Research Projects DARIAH-GR EuropeanaSounds EuropeanaSpace Publications Google Scholar dblp Teaching Undergraduate courses Programming Techniques (3.4.03.2) (2nd semester) Artificial Intelligence (3.4.27.7) (7th semester) Knowledge Systems and Technologies (3.4.41.8) (8th semester) Human-Computer Interaction (3.4.39.8) (8th semester) Neural Networks and Intelligent Systems (3.4.55.9) (9th semester) Graduate courses Semantic Web Technologies (698) Artificial Neural Networks and Machine Learning (316) Advanced Data Science and Data Analytics (708) If you want to join the Artificial Intelligence Group (as a diploma or a PhD student), please send me an e-mail. Past Activities Academic Visitor [September 2011-March 2012], Department of Computer Science, University of Oxford, Information Systems Group Co-chair of the 28th International Workshop on Description Logics Organising chair of the 10th Reasoning Web Summer School and the 8th International Conference on Web Reasoning and Rule Systems RuleML (Steering Committee) W3C Rule Interchange Format Working Group W3C Uncertainty Reasoning for the WWW Incubator Group W3C OWL Working Group Technical Advisory Board for the digitisation and web publication of the content of Greek cultural archives and libraries Development of web-based archiving and annotating systems for the audiovisual archives and film production companies Tools Fuzzy description logic reasoning engine FiRE Query rewriting engine for DL-Lite (Rapid) (download) Incremental Query Answering and Rewriting for OntologieS (IQAROS) (download) Copyright Notice.
